name: Xorn
lore: Xorns are bizarre elemental creatures native to the Elemental Plane of Earth. They have radially symmetrical, barrel-shaped bodies with three eyes, three arms ending in taloned hands, and a wide mouth atop their heads. Xorns have an insatiable appetite for gems and precious metals, which they can detect by scent. They burrow through earth and stone as easily as a fish swims through water, leaving no tunnel or trace of their passage. While not inherently hostile, xorns can become aggressive when denied the minerals they crave.

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.description: The xorn can burrow through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the xorn doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Treasure Sense
traits.description: The xorn can pinpoint, by scent, the location of precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of itself.

multiattack.description: The xorn makes one Bite attack and three Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Slashing damage.
